body: At 6th level, a wild stalker can either take a rage power, or gains a +2 insight bonus into any one of the following skills: Acrobatics, Climb, Perception, Stealth, Survival, or Swim. The wild stalker can gain one of these two benefits again every five levels after 6th (to a maximum of 4 times at 20th level). This ability replaces the ranger's 6th-, 10th-, 14th-, and 18th-level combat style feat abilities.
name: Wild Talents
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Ranger/Ranger Archetypes/Wild stalker/Wild Talents
